caption: Charlie felt that Jack was in danger, so he drove the car into the hall. At the same time, Jack rushed toward the energy ball and get it. His battle suit was charged successfully and its energy was restored. With the help of the suit and the children, Jack defeated the boss and protected the energy ball. Charlie finally understood his father. Everyone was very happy and they danced in the hall. Later, Charlie also became a guard. They had a new headquarters and a new car. Whenever someone called for help, they would immediately set out and do their best to safeguard world peace.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Does it looks like real story? Or it looks like a science fiction movie?)
global.answer: No. It seems like a science fiction movie
